Websitegenerator settings

Several options exposed for the user of the library to modify to their liking :)

Consts

wgsHtmlEntitiesUseNumbersInsteadOfName {.booldefine.}: bool = false
Setting: Uses numbers ("<" -> "&#60;") instead of names ("<" -> "&lt;") for HTML Entity stringification 
wgsInternalRawTextHtmlTag {.booldefine.}: string = "{.websitegenerator-raw-text.}"
Setting: Internal tag for raw text, alongside "" 
wgsOmitDocumentDoctype {.booldefine.}: bool = false
Setting: Omits <!DOCTYPE html> at beginning of HTML document 
wgsOmitDocumentHtmlTags {.booldefine.}: bool = false
Setting: Omits <html> and </html> tags of an HTML document 
wgsRawTextSeparator {.strdefine.}: string = "br"
Setting: Join tag for raw text appending via sugar module 
wgsSelfClosingTagsTrailingSlash {.booldefine.}: bool = true
Setting: Trailing slash for self-closing elements 
wgsSortCssProperties {.booldefine.}: bool = false
Setting: Alphabetically sorts CSS properties (reordering may break CSS in some instances) 
wgsSortHtmlAttributes {.booldefine.}: bool = true
Setting: Alphabetically sorts HTML attributes

Templates

template websitegeneratorGenerateSelfClosingTags(): untyped {.
    ...deprecated: "use `wgsSelfClosingTagsTrailingSlash` instead".}
Deprecated: use `wgsSelfClosingTagsTrailingSlash` instead 
template websitegeneratorRawTextElementIdentifier(): untyped {.
    ...deprecated: "use `wgsInternalRawTextHtmlTag` instead".}
Deprecated: use `wgsInternalRawTextHtmlTag` instead 
template websitegeneratorSugarAppendingRawTextSeparator(): untyped {.
    ...deprecated: "use `wgsRawTextSeparator` instead".}
Deprecated: use `wgsRawTextSeparator` instead 
template websitegeneratorSugarAppendingRawTextSeperator(): untyped {.
    ...deprecated: "use `wgsRawTextSeparator` instead".}
Deprecated: use `wgsRawTextSeparator` instead
